document_data.name: Fonmara
document_data.mainbody:
'''Fonmara''' was a [[duergar|duergar mind master]] and a [[Cult of the Absolute|cultist]] of [[the Absolute]] that dwelled in the ruins of [[Grymforge]] for a time during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|I've gor my eye on you. Enough goin' wrong without outsider meddlin'.|Fonmara.}}
document_data.Personality: She was a distrusting individual that remained viligant against any threat that may present itself to her fellow devotess of the Absolute.
document_data.Abilities: Like other mind masters, Fonmarra possessed the [[psionic]] ability to briefly take over the mind of others and force them to attack their allies in battle.
document_data.History: Fonmarra was among the Absolute loyalists that accompanied [[True Soul]] [[Nere]] and Sergeant [[Thrinn]] on their excavation of the [[Shar]]ran temple within the depths of Grymforge in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
